name: Cook Fu
overview:
Cook Fu is a daily deal service addressed to food oriented customers. Providing geotargetted food and drink offers and using other mobile features reach consumers 24/7. Every day at 12 am mobile app users get notification about current offers in their location.

CookFu.com is available both on desktop and mobile version.

Unlike coupon services Cook Fu allows making short term deals without included fee. Venue managers choose their most creative specials to interest customers. Chosen Chef’s specials, meals of the day or unique dishes available only for a short period of time are published on Cook Fu map and venue’s wall. Cook Fu also helps improve the business by giving feedback like: viewers history and popularity ranking.

Cook Fu is a easy-to-use city guide that masters lunch.
